dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3377408L] Use of the State Farm Trademark
dmca.body:
T -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, March 07, 2007 3:25 PM To: zzzzzz Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3377408L] Use of the State Farm Trademark ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Use of the State Farm Trademark Added by system at Wednesday, Mar 7 2007 01:04 pm X-MailFrom: home.law-internetcd.681e00@statefarm.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Mar 7 13:04:37 2007 Received: (qmail 22868 invoked by alias); 7 Mar 2007 19:04:37 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 22865 invoked from network); 7 Mar 2007 19:04:37 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 7 Mar 2007 19:04:37 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 7 Mar 2007 13:04:36 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 07 Mar 2007 13:04:36 -0600 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from home.law-internetcd.681e00@statefarm.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HP1RD-000563-Vw for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 07 Mar 2007 13:04:36 -0600 Received: from netc.statefarm.com ([12.34.246.30]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from home.law-internetcd.681e00@statefarm.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HP1R0-000C4m-GN for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 07 Mar 2007 13:04:22 -0600 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message Return-Receipt-To: "HOME LAW-INTERNETCD" MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C760EB.689465BC" X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 Subject: Use of the State Farm Trademark Date: Wed, 7 Mar 2007 12:04:19 -0700 Message-ID: X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Use of the State Farm Trademark Thread-Index: Acdg62iAVnfXc/2cTp2+Ol2290KAsQ== From: "HOME LAW-INTERNETCD" To: X-OriginalArrivalTime: 07 Mar 2007 19:04:19.0760 (UTC) FILETIME=[68F1B300:01C760EB] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY One State Farm Plaza Bloomington, Illinois 61710-0001 abuse@theplanet.com RE: Use of the State Farm Trademark Dear Sir/Madam: This is to notify you that Leighton Alan Holdings is infringing our trademark "State Farm Insurance" within the content of the web page "www.free-hawaii-vacation-tips.com/statefarminsurance/wp/?p=5." Our research reflects that The Planet is the ISP for this website. The web site uses our U.S. federally registered trademark "State Farm Insurance." This trademark was registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office on September 11, 1979. The owner is State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance Company. The mark has been in use in interstate commerce since 1930. This is also the year of our first use. This mark is used for insurance services, see Registration No. 1,125,010. This company is not authorized to use our trademark "State Farm Insurance." Further, cease and desist emails were sent to the email address of the administrative contact on September 27, 2006, October 27, 2006, and November 28, 2006, but no responses have been received. As of this date, our trademark is still used in the website. The company who registered this domain name, which infringes our trademark, has done so in violation of your posted Acceptable Usage Policy at Intellectual Property Infringement Policy: Users may not transmit, distribute, download, copy, cache, host, or otherwise store on a Server, The Planet Network or its physical infrastructure any information, data, material, or work that infringes the intellectual property rights of others or violates any trade secret right of any other person. The Planet has the right to disable access to, or remove, infringing content to the extent required under any law or regulation, including the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998.... Please initiate an investigation and have our trademark removed from this site, or have the site terminated. I would appreciate hearing from you as to what action will be taken by the close of business on March 27, 2007. Sincerely, Debra J. Monke, ACP Intellectual Property Administrator home.law-internetcd.681e00@statefarm.com DJM/rje MIME element (text/html) Use of the State Farm Trademark

STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY
